invalid_credentials.title: Login Failed
invalid_credentials.message: Incorrect email or password. Please try again.

account_locked.title: Account Locked
account_locked.message: Your account has been temporarily locked due to too many login attempts. Please try again in 15 minutes or contact support.

email.title: Invalid Email Format
email.message: Please enter a valid email address, e.g., name@domain.com.

internal_error.title: Something Went Wrong
internal_error.message: An error occurred on our server. Our team is working to fix it. Please try again later.

not_found.title: Not Found
not_found.message: The item you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.

alredy.title: Item alredy exist
alredy.message: Your data with this {field} already exists

in_use.title: Item in use
in_use.message: Cannot delete this {field} because it is being used
